description: This plugin allows you to easily render an image on your Bubble page. You can customize how the image fits within its container by selecting different object-fit options (contain, cover, fill, or scale-down) and apply a grayscale filter if needed. Itâ€™s perfect for dynamically displaying images where direct URLs are not available or when working with inline image data.
name: Image Fit Your Feel
plugin_instructions:
Usage Instructions
Add the Plugin Element:
Drag and drop the plugin element onto your Bubble page.

Configure the Image Source:

Provide an image via the image property.

Customize Image Display:

Object-Fit: Choose how the image should be scaled using the object_fit property. Options include:
1: Contain
2: Cover
3: Fill
4: Scale-down
0: None (if none of the above are selected)
Grayscale Filter: Adjust the grayScale property to apply a grayscale effect (0% - 100%).
